dmca.title: Violation of Copyright
dmca.body:
o Whom It May Concern:

 

The URLs in question are currently not accessible as of 3:40:54 p.m.
(GMT-6) on October 26, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

 


________________________________

From: Pamela Lynn [mailto:lynn1551@yahoo.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 9:30 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Violation of Copyright
Subject: Fwd: Violation of Copyright




Pamela Lynn <lynn1551@yahoo.com> wrote: 

        Date: Mon, 23 Oct 2006 10:16:19 -0700 (PDT)
        From: Pamela Lynn <lynn1551@yahoo.com>
        Subject: Violation of Copyright
        To: abuse@theplanet.com
        
        
        A user of The Planet is posting stolen stories on six different
websites.  He or she has copied my stories, "Under the Dryer" and "A
Romantic Tail Ch. 02" without my permission.
         
        The originals are located on Literotica.com:
http://english.literotica.com/stories/showstory.php?id=228357 ,
http://english.literotica.com/stories/showstory.php?id=261640 and
http://english.literotica.com/stories/showstory.php?id=184056
         
        The stolen versions are here:
http://xxlpenis.com/2006/10/11/under_the_dryer/ , here:
http://xxlpenis.com/2006/09/29/a_romantic_tail_ch_02/ and
http://xxlpenis.com/2006/09/28/an_interview_with_satan/
         
        I hereby assert that my name is Pamela Lynn, that I am the
author and sole legal owner of these stories, and that the The Planet
user running the website "xxlpenis.com" has committed an offense against
the Section 501 of the United States Copyright Act and "the infringement
may also constitute a criminal misdemeanor or felony, which would be
prosecuted by the U.S. Department of Justice."
         
        I expect immediate attention to this matter.  You have 2
business days to respond before I bring this to the attention of my
attorney.
